MEAT & POULTRY: Beef, Lamb, Pork — ONLY grass-fed, lean; pasture-raised whenever possible); please consume sparingly; limit portion to 4-6 ounces
LEGUMES:
Soy — Edamame, Tofu, 
Tempeh, Miso, Natto

SWEETS:
Dried fruit — Goji, fig, cranberries,
raisin, prunes (1.5 oz, 40g)
(sparingly please)

LEGUMES:
Other — Adzuki, Black, 
Cannelini, Chickpea, Fava,
Kidney, Mung, Navy, Pinto

VEGETABLES:
Winter Squash  — Acorn,
Butternut, Pumpkin — 1 cup
SWEETS:
Herbs (dry or fresh) — Rosemary, 
Oregano, Parsley, Cilantro,
Basil, Mint, Thyme, Dill, Sage

LEGUMES:
Plant — Soy / Bean, 
Pea, Nut, Seed, Grain

FRUIT: Please focus on lower-sugar fruits (above ↑) and consume higher sugar fruits (below ↓) sparingly; serving size =  1 cup (berries/melon) or one small fruit

NUTS & SEEDS: Cream / Half & half — grass fed preferred
VEGETABLES:
Dark Leaves — Arugula, 
Collard, Kale, Spinach, 
Watercress, Swiss Chard

SEAFOOD: * while these fish offer healthful oils and/or high-quality protein, they are higher in mercury, please consume  sparingly

LEGUMES:
Wheat — Wheat bran, 
Wheat berries, Kanut, Spelt
** please moderate total amount of carbohydrate at each meal; serving size = 1/2 - 1 cup cooked

SWEETS: * while these beverages offer health benefits, they also contain caffeine; please consume early in the day and moderate portions
